episode.title: Massachusetts Board of Retirement v. Murgia

section.heading: Opinion Announcement of Chief Justice Warren E. Burger

turn.speaker: warren_e_burger
turn.label: Chief Justice Warren E. Burger
turn.text: In 74-1044, Massachusetts Board of Retirement against Murgia, for reasons stated in an opinion filed with the clerk this morning, the judgment of the United States District Court for the District of Massachusetts is reversed.
Mr. Justice Marshall filed a dissenting opinion.
Mr. Justice Stevens took no part in the consideration or the decision of this case.
